channel.title: Team on Cyber Security Summit: Bangalore 2020

item.title: Arun S
item.description: Arun is a Senior Security Consultant @ IBM - India Software Labs.

item.title: Ashokkumar Ratanagiri
item.description: Ashokkumar Ratanagiri - Director & Head - Product Security and Systems Engineering at EdgeVerve Systems Ltd.

item.title: Parag Dave
item.description: Parag is a Sr. Security Test Engineer working at Qualitrix Technologies.

item.title: Sujatha Yakasiri
item.description: Sujatha Yakasiri works as a Computer Scientist in Information Security and Risk Management team at EdgeVerve (a subsidiary of Infosys Limited).

item.title: Vishal Panchani
item.description: Vishal - highly professional security consultant with 3 years of Industry experience in Information Security where currently responsible for performing penetration testing of web applications, mobile applications, thick client applications and network.
